Mass Net Cheating At Edinburgh University

13 Jul 1999

Last week, Edinburgh University acted to withhold the exam marks of 90 computer science students, while it investigates accusations of online cheating.

\nThe University launched the investigation after examiners found remarkable similarities between submitted essays, suspecting that students had downloaded essay templates from web sites such as CyberEssays.

\nThere's more info at the BBC.
